rukus.text: 'in aladhin khafuu rabihim fi aldnya, wataquu eadhabah bamtthal awamrh wajtnab nwahyh, hum yawm alqiamat fi zilal al'ashjar alwarft waeuyun alma' aljaryt, wafawakih kathirat mimaa tashtahih 'anfusahum ytnemwn. yuqal lhm: kuluu 'aklana ldhydhana, washrabuu shrbana hnyyana; bsbb ma qadamtum fi aldunya min salih alaemal. 'iinaa bimithl dhlk aljaza' aleazim najzi 'ahl al'iihsan fi 'aemalahum wtaethm lna. hlak waeadhab shadid yawm alqiamat lilmukadhibin biawm aljaza' walhisab wama fih min alnaeim waledhab
